document_data.mainbody:
he Black Eye was an Eye of Gruumsh orc shaman who lived in the Many-Arrows-occupied Tower District of Neverwinter in the late 15 century DR.
The Black Eye acted as the guardian of a shrine of Gruumsh that had been erected by the Many-Arrows orcs in the districts Merchant Square.
In the , the Black Eye fought a battle with Gord Roundshield and wounded the dwarf in the gut. To get his revenge, Gord Roundshield enlisted a dwarven adventurer to kill the Black Eye and burn his shrine to the ground to draw the shaman out.
